amendment.description: Amendment provides that none of the funds in the bill may be used in violation of Federal law concerning rights in technical data.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in the Congressional Record to limit funds in the bill for use in contravention of laws regarding importation of counterfeit goods and services.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Terry amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Terry.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Terry amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
